title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Sim Update VIII - transition from beta to production
description:
In this video we will have a quick look how you can transition from beta to the normal MSFS build. This is only applicable if you participated during the beta. The steps discussed need to be followed after Sim Update VIII has been released which is scheduled for the 28th of March.
